I thought this was supposed to go into contrib/opt, which I think is the right spot, unless there's a strong reason to put it directly into core. — You are receiving this because you modified the open/close state. body_text:
SG. Yes I missed this too 😯

On Apr 13, 2017 8:54 AM, "Martin Wicke" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

We should revert this. I thought this was supposed to go into contrib/opt,
which I think is the right spot, unless there's a strong reason to put it
directly into core.

—

directly into core.
